issue.title: [C++] Arrow-native C++ Data Frame-style programming interface for analytics (umbrella issue)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8939](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8939). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is an umbrella issue for the "C++ Data Frame" project that has been discussed on the mailing list with the following Google docs overview

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XHe_j87n2VHGzEbnLe786GHbbcbrzbjgG8D0IXWAeHg/edit

I will attach issues to this JIRA to help organize and track the project as we make progress.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8939?focusedCommentId=17285905) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Are we still looking to tackle this in the near future? Otherwise we may as well close this issue.
